abstract: Clay Christensen’s bracing ideas about management are more relevant than ever as the tech industry seeks redemption.
lead_paragraph: It’s nothing but noise, all the time. We get hammered every second from an incessant sousaphone of tweets and from the righteous rage machine that screams at us in this digitized 24/7/365 communications world that we have built.
keywords: The Innovator's Dilemma: When New Technologies Cause Great Firms to Fail (Book)
